metadata.synopsis: Cultist lectures the trainees at the training site.

0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
0.text: Remember - feint, distract, deceive. The blade is not the only weapon at your distraction.
0.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

1.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
1.text: Never turn your back on a fallen foe until you are sure they are dead.
1.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
2.text: And remember - even a graze can be fatal to the enemy, if you poison your blade.
2.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.

3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
3.text: Stab the corpse if you must. Do not die because of carelessness.
3.context: NodeContext: Giving instructions to shar cult trainees at a training site.
